backend/main.mo: Implements supporter request handling, supporter approval, and user profile storage with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the Plushie Assistant and chat system.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, age gate, and registers the Plushie Assistant page.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age verification component that checks localStorage and blocks access unless the user confirms being 18+.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication control component handling login, profile navigation, and admin claiming with dropdown UI.
frontend/src/components/community/Linkif: Renders text with linkified URLs and embedded videos using token-based parsing.
frontend/src/components/community/Modera: Displays moderation queue items with approve/reject actions and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/community/PollCa: Shows a single poll with voting UI, results, supporter badge, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PollsS: Lists polls and provides a form for authenticated users to create new polls with option limits.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Provides edit and delete controls for a post, including dialogs to update fields or confirm deletion. Manages form state and triggers backend edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Displays and toggles comments for a post, handles comment creation, and shows backend errors or loading states. Includes form validation and identity checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Renders an attached post image by converting raw bytes to a blob URL. Cleans up the object URL on unmount.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Shows a like button with count and manages like/unlike actions. Handles authentication and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostVi: Embeds a post's video using a direct streaming URL. Renders a video element with multiple source types.
frontend/src/components/community/VideoE: Renders a responsive 16:9 iframe embed for approved video providers like YouTube and Vimeo. Uses provided embed URL and metadata.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Displays a fullscreen lightbox for gallery items with navigation, favorites, optional deletion, and keyboard controls. Handles media types including video and storybook formats.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Provides a dialog to upload image or video files with validation, progress tracking, and sending media to the backend. Manages form state and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main page layout with header, navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Simple loading indicator with spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop buttons and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Component for uploading, previewing, validating, and removing a user's avatar image.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Profile editor panel allowing users to update display info, avatar, links, plushie images, and visibility settings.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: Manages upload, preview, validation, and removal of multiple plushie images.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a grid of profile plushie images using their direct URLs.
Renders a list of external profile links with safe URL handling.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: Visual badge component showing a supporter label with an icon.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Exports article data and structure for plushie-related content.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Placeholder module for event content (currently empty).
frontend/src/content/teddyStorybook.ts: Provides metadata and text for a plushie-themed storybook entry.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that builds and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistantChat.ts: Hook managing assistant chat state, persistence, message processing, and quick actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryFavorites.t: Manages a localStorage-backed set of gallery favorite IDs with helpers to toggle and check favorites.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryMediaQuerie: Provides React Query hooks to list, add, and delete gallery media items using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and update user profiles, including directory listings, own profile, and edits.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for posts, moderation, and admin checks, with actor-safe mutations for post actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Checks availability of static assets via a cached React Query call to a HEAD/GET fallback checker.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: Hooks to manage supporter data, requests, approvals, and lookups using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus a custom light-themed color palette and global typography settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, values, offerings, and guidelines for the Plushie Haven community using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Displays a grid of adult pacifier brands with descriptions and specialties, plus an informational section about the list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Shows a full article based on slug lookup, including metadata, summary, and formatted content with navigation back to the articles list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in a responsive card grid with categories, read times, summaries, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a full community board with post creation, editing, deletion, media attachments, moderation, and interaction features.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens an email client and includes a copy‑to‑clipboard email section.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Allows users to view and create events with validation, backend error handling, and formatted event display.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery with search, favorites, lightbox navigation, uploads, and delete permissions based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the site hero section, featured imagery, and navigation buttons to articles and community pages.
Provides an AI chat interface with message history, quick prompts, auto‑scrolling, and chat‑clearing confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of curated plushie brand cards with descriptions and specialties.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Loads and displays user profiles with follow/like actions, edit mode handling, and empty‑state creation for new users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Displays a public profiles directory with loading, error, empty, and grid views, and supports creating or navigating to profiles.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Provides supporter request submission and admin management features, including approving and revoking supporters.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly text and sanitizes low‑level details.
frontend/src/utils/galleryMedia.ts: Defines gallery item types and helpers to convert, merge, and filter static, storybook, and uploaded media items.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Handles image file validation, conversion to byte data, and size/type formatting for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Parses text into structured tokens for links and video embeds using URL detection and normalization.
frontend/src/utils/plushieAssistant.ts: Implements scripted plushie assistant logic including intent detection, care tips, fun facts, and recommendation flow with session state management.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Provides utilities for converting files to bytes or ExternalBlob, creating and revoking preview URLs, and retrieving blob display URLs.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks reachability of static assets using HEAD and fallback GET requests with abort control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and safe removal of hash parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoAttachment.ts: Validates video uploads by type and size and includes utilities for formatting file sizes.
frontend/src/utils/videoEmbeds.ts: Detects YouTube and Vimeo URLs and returns standardized embed descriptors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing features, and requirements for the on-device plushie assistant system.
